I think you might really enjoy "Taxi Driver"! This classic film, directed by Martin Scorsese and starring Robert De Niro, is a gritty and intense portrayal of life in New York City during the 1970s. It's a powerful exploration of loneliness, isolation, and the blurred lines between reality and fantasy.

If you're looking for something a bit more recent, I'd also recommend "300". This visually stunning film brings to life the epic battle of Thermopylae, featuring Gerard Butler as King Leonidas and an all-star cast. It's a thrilling and action-packed ride that's sure to keep you on the edge of your seat!
